```{r}
library(network)
library(ergm)

g <- read.table("g30.edgelist")
net <- network(g, directed = FALSE)



# Ajustar modelo con tÃ©rminos "edges" y "triangles"
fit <- ergm(
  net ~ edges
        + gwesp(0.25, fixed = TRUE)
        + gwdegree(0.25, fixed = TRUE),
  control = control.ergm(MCMLE.maxit = 50,
                         MCMC.burnin = 1e5,
                         MCMC.interval = 1e4)
)


summary(fit)
```
